Test Case Description: Verify Display of All Products List
Test Steps: 1. Open the application 2. Navigate to the shop page
Expected Results: All products should be displayed in the list
Actual Results: All products are displayed in the list

Test Case Description: Verify Fallback UI on Server Error
Test Steps: 1. Open the application 2. Navigate to the shop page 3. Trigger a server error (e.g., by manipulating network requests)
Expected Results: An error message should be displayed

Test Case Description: Verify Navigation to Product Details Page from Product List
Test Steps: 1. Open the application 2. Navigate to the product list page 3. Click on a product from the list
Expected Results: Product detail page for the selected product should be displayed
Actual Results: Product detail page for the selected product is displayed

Test Case Description: Verify Error Message for Unavailable Product
Test Steps: 1. Open the application 2. Navigate to the product list page 3. Search for a product that doesn't exist
Expected Results: An error message should be displayed (e.g., "No product found")

Test Steps: 1. Open the application on a mobile device 2. Navigate through different pages and features
Expected Results: The layout and content should adapt to the screen size and all features should be accessible
Actual Results: Layout and content adjusts properly to screen size as intended

Test Steps: 1. Open the application on different browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) and devices (desktop, mobile, tablet)
Expected Results: Application should function correctly and display consistently across all browsers and devices

Test Steps: 1. Open the application 2. Navigate to the Product Details Page 3. Click on Add to Cart
Expected Results: Product should be added to cart, Cart Icon should update with item count

Test Steps: 1. Open the application 2. Add a product to the cart 3. Navigate to the Cart Page 4. Increase the quantity of the product in the cart
Expected Results: Cart should be updated with increased quantity of the product

Test Steps: 1. Open the application 2. Add a product to the cart 3. Navigate to Cart Page 4. Decrease the quantity of the product
Expected Results: Cart should be updated with decreased quantity of the product

Test Steps: 1. Open the application 2. Add a product to the cart 3. Navigate to Cart Page 4. Remove the product from the cart
Expected Results: Cart should be updated, Product should be removed from the cart
